outputs.output_descr:
This project aims to:
1: Legislative reform and policy-making of the GoI supported for Disaster Risk Reduction framework in Iraq
2: DRR programme developed for creation of a Disaster Risk Reduction Institution in Iraq

project_descr: Poverty reduction and environmental sustainability in Iraq through Preparatory Assistance to Disaster Risk Reduction
